TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PropertyMetadata extends System.Object

summary.span: 在特定行為方面定義相依性屬性，因為它會套用到特定的類型，包括註冊時所用的條件。

span.span: Defines certain behavior aspects of a dependency property as it is applied to a specific type, including conditions it was registered with.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性中繼資料可以定義，以及呼叫時，在相依性屬性註冊期間使用方法 （或附加的屬性或唯讀相依性屬性的變體），或之後呼叫時的原始擁有者登錄方法。Property metadata can be defined and used during dependency property registration when calling the method (or variations for attached properties or read-only dependency properties), or after original owner registration when calling the method. 也會採用屬性中繼資料。 also takes property metadata. 這個類別是可用於每個這些呼叫的具象基底類別。This class is a concrete base class that can be used in each of these calls. 不過，是很常見，指定中繼資料，例如使用其中一種衍生類別。However, it is very common to specify metadata using one of the derived classes such as . 這些衍生的類別支援更詳細的中繼資料做為布林屬性值，可用於偵測或啟用只在實作某些屬性系統和配置行為執行[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]架構層級。These derived classes support more detailed metadata carried as Boolean property values, which are useful for either detecting or enabling some property system and layout behaviors that are only implemented at the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] framework level. 這個類別的一些屬性，以讀寫物件模型，但只能在這類的使用中的屬性系統作業的執行個體之前寫入或。Several properties of this class are read-write to the object model, but can only be written prior to the instance being used in a property system operation such as or . 每一個屬性可能也已設定的建構函式，但會公開讓方法實作可以設定它們。Each of these properties could also have been set by the constructor but are exposed so that method implementations can set them. ## XAML 文字用法XAML Text Usage 此型別和成員，這種不通常會以[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。This type, and members of this type, are not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object defaultValue) cil managed

param.name: defaultValue
param.span: 指定相依性屬性的預設值，通常做為某些特定型別的值提供。

span.span: The default value to specify for a dependency property, usually provided as a value of some specific type.

summary.span: 使用要套用這個中繼資料之相依性屬性的指定預設值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified default value for the dependency property that this metadata will be applied to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供值的型別`defaultValue`必須相符或相關的原始註冊相依性屬性會套用這個中繼資料中指定的型別。The type of the value provided for `defaultValue` must be match or be related to the type specified in the original registration of the dependency property that this metadata will be applied to. 因為 （不符項目會引發執行階段例外狀況） 的編譯期間未偵測到不符項目，很難偵錯時，中繼資料的預設值類型與套用至相依性屬性的型別之間的不符。Mismatches between metadata default value type and the type of the dependency property it is being applied to can be difficult to debug, because the mismatch is not detectable during compilation (the mismatch will raise a run-time exception). 雖然它是預設的無參數建構函式每`defaultValue`的不指定。Although it is the default per the parameterless constructor, a `defaultValue` of cannot be specified. 嘗試這麼做的話，將會引發例外狀況。Attempting to do so will raise an exception. ## Examples [!code-csharp[PropertyMetadataAPIs#Initpm](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMetadataAPIs/CSharp/Class1.cs#initpm)] [!code-csharp[PropertyMetadataAPIs#PMCtor1param](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMetadataAPIs/CSharp/Class1.cs#pmctor1param)]

span.span: cannot be set to the value .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要指定但不是，您可以傳遞`null`如`propertyChangedCallback`參數。If you want to specify a but not a , you can pass `null` for the `propertyChangedCallback` parameter. 提供值的型別`defaultValue`必須相符或相關的原始註冊相依性屬性會套用這個中繼資料中指定的型別。The type of the value provided for `defaultValue` must be match or be related to the type specified in the original registration of the dependency property that this metadata will be applied to. 因為 （不符項目會引發執行階段例外狀況） 的編譯期間未偵測到不符項目，很難偵錯時，中繼資料的預設值類型與套用至相依性屬性的型別之間的不符。Mismatches between metadata default value type and the type of the dependency property it is being applied to can be difficult to debug, because the mismatch is not detectable during compilation (the mismatch will raise a run-time exception). 雖然它是預設的無參數建構函式每`defaultValue`的不指定。Although it is the default per the parameterless constructor, a `defaultValue` of cannot be specified. 嘗試這麼做的話，將會引發例外狀況。Attempting to do so will raise an exception. ## Examples [!code-csharp[PropertyMetadataAPIs#Initpm](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMetadataAPIs/CSharp/Class1.cs#initpm)] [!code-csharp[PropertyMetadataAPIs#PMCtor3param](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMetadataAPIs/CSharp/Class1.cs#pmctor3param)]

summary.span: 取得或設定在這個中繼資料中指定之 實作的參考。

span.span: Gets or sets a reference to a implementation specified in this metadata.
A implementation reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性中繼資料中的回呼不包含的類型，通常是公用成員，因此這個屬性的值並不重要，在大部分情況下，只要使用 現有相依性屬性的中繼資料。The callbacks in property metadata are not typically public members on the containing type, so the value of this property is not important for most scenarios that just consume an existing dependency property's metadata. 這個屬性會公開的其中一個原因是，讓中繼資料的子類別可以執行他們想要的合併的邏輯，基底中繼資料和覆寫或加入的中繼資料指定。One reason this property is exposed is so that metadata subclasses can perform their desired merge logic if both base metadata and overriding/adding metadata specify a . 不過，預設值合併邏輯是取代舊的金鑰。However, the default merge logic for a is to replace the previous one. 是物件模型中定義為讀寫。 is defined in the object model as read-write. 這種情形初始化之後，您可以調整物件本身。This is so can be adjusted after initialization of the object itself. 不過，一旦一部分的呼叫會使用中繼資料， ，或、 對屬性系統將密封該中繼資料執行個體和內容現在會被視為不變。However, once the metadata is consumed as part of a call to , , or , the property system will seal that metadata instance and the properties are now considered immutable. 嘗試設定一旦是`true`此中繼資料執行個體將會引發例外狀況。Attempting to set once is `true` on this metadata instance will raise an exception.

exception.span: 一旦套用至相依性屬性作業，便無法設定中繼資料屬性。

span.span: Cannot set a metadata property once it is applied to a dependency property operation.

value.span: 上的預設值具有無參數建構函式所建立的執行個體將會。

span.span: The default value on a instance created with the parameterless constructor will be .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是物件模型中定義為讀寫。 is defined in the object model as read-write. 這種情形初始化之後，您可以調整物件本身。This is so can be adjusted after initialization of the object itself. 不過，一旦一部分的呼叫會使用中繼資料， ，或、 對屬性系統將密封該中繼資料執行個體和內容現在會被視為不變。However, once the metadata is consumed as part of a call to , , or , the property system will seal that metadata instance and the properties are now considered immutable. 嘗試設定一旦是`true`此中繼資料執行個體將會引發例外狀況。Attempting to set once is `true` on this metadata instance will raise an exception. 雖然它是預設的無參數建構函式每`defaultValue`的無法使用設定或建構函式。Although it is the default per the parameterless constructor, a `defaultValue` of cannot be set using either or the constructor. 嘗試這麼做的話，將會引發例外狀況。Attempting to do so will raise an exception. ## XAML 文字用法XAML Text Usage 這個類型的成員不通常會以[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Members of this type are not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

exception.span: 一旦建立，便無法設定為值 。

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property IsSealed As Boolean
protected: property bool IsSealed { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值判斷中繼資料是否已經以某種方式套用至屬性，導致中繼資料執行個體的不可變狀態。

span.span: Gets a value that determines whether the metadata has been applied to a property in some way, resulting in the immutable state of that metadata instance.

value.span: 如果中繼資料執行個體是不可變的則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the metadata instance is immutable; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 各種屬性，例如，為讀寫物件模型中定義。Various properties of , such as , are defined in the object model as read-write. 這是可以初始化之後調整這些屬性，因此物件本身。This is so those properties can be adjusted after initialization of the object itself. 不過，一旦中繼資料套用至相依性屬性來呼叫過程， ，或、 對屬性系統將密封該中繼資料執行個體和內容現在會被視為不變。However, once the metadata is applied to a dependency property as part of a call to , , or , the property system will seal that metadata instance and the properties are now considered immutable. 在這些呼叫，其中的階段呼叫，且這個屬性的值設定為`true`。At the time of one of these calls, is called, and the value of this property is set to `true`. ## Examples 下列範例會檢查之前設定作業的自訂中繼資料屬性。The following example checks prior to a set operation of a custom metadata property. [!code-csharp[PropertyMetadataAPIs#MergeImpl](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMetadataAPIs/CSharp/Class1.cs#mergeimpl)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void Merge (System.Windows.PropertyMetadata baseMetadata, System.Windows.DependencyProperty dp);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Merge(class System.Windows.PropertyMetadata baseMetadata, class System.Windows.DependencyProperty dp) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Merge (baseMetadata As PropertyMetadata, dp As DependencyProperty)
protected: virtual void Merge(System::Windows::PropertyMetadata ^ baseMetadata, System::Windows::DependencyProperty ^ dp);

param.name: baseMetadata
param.span: 要與這個執行個體值合併的基底中繼資料。

span.span: The base metadata to merge with this instance's values.

param.name: dp
param.span: 要套用這個中繼資料的相依性屬性。

span.span: The dependency property to which this metadata is being applied.

summary.span: 合併這個中繼資料和基底中繼資料。

span.span: Merges this metadata with the base metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用在內部中繼資料覆寫時 (方法)。This method is used internally when metadata is being overridden ( method). ## Examples 下列範例會實作會將額外屬性加入屬性中繼資料的自訂中繼資料類型的合併。The following example implements a merge for a custom metadata type that adds an additional property to the property metadata. [!code-csharp[PropertyMetadataAPIs#MergeImpl](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMetadataAPIs/CSharp/Class1.cs#mergeimpl)]

para.span: 類別衍生自的實作應該覆寫這個方法，以針對任何中繼資料屬性，在他們的實作中加入這些帳戶。

span.span: Class implementations that derive from should override this method to account for any metadata properties they have added in their implementations.

para.span: 比方說，您的實作可能已經加入新旗列舉值，而實作應該可以正確結合這些旗標。

span.span: For instance, your implementation might have added a new flagwise enumeration value, and the implementation should then be able to combine those flags correctly.

para.span: 因為基底實作會處理合併上已定義的所有內容，請務必呼叫基底實作，在您的實作程式碼之前型別。

span.span: Always call the base implementation prior to your implementation code, because the base implementation takes care of merging all the properties already defined on the type.

para.span: 合併的確切行為是由您決定。

span.span: The exact behavior of the merge is up to you.

para.span: 您可以選擇有合併的值，請還原成基底值，如果衍生的中繼資料保留預設值或根據您已新增到您的特定中繼資料類別和其意義的屬性類型的其他行為。

span.span: You could choose to have values combined, revert to base value if the derived metadata were left at the default, or many other behaviors based on the types of properties you have added to your particular metadata class, and their meanings.

param.name: dp

span.span: The dependency property to which the metadata has been applied.

param.name: targetType
param.span: 如果這是型別特定的中繼資料，則為與這個中繼資料相關聯的型別。

span.span: The type associated with this metadata if this is type-specific metadata.

param.span: 如果這是預設中繼資料，則該值是 null 參考。

span.span: If this is default metadata, this value is a null reference.

summary.span: 在這個中繼資料已套用至屬性時呼叫，表示要密封中繼資料。

span.span: Called when this metadata has been applied to a property, which indicates that the metadata is being sealed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 子類別應該確保任何可變動性的資料結構的子類別應該標示為不可變一次呼叫。Subclasses should assure that any mutability of the data structure of a subclass should be marked as immutable once is called. 這會呼叫中繼資料套用至屬性系統作業之後 （登錄、 將擁有者新增、 覆寫中繼資料）。This will be called once the metadata is applied to a property system operation (register, add owner, override metadata).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::PropertyChangedCallback ^ PropertyChangedCallback { System::Windows::PropertyChangedCallback ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::PropertyChangedCallback ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定在這個中繼資料中指定之 實作的參考。

span.span: Gets or sets a reference to a implementation specified in this metadata.
A implementation reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性中繼資料中的回呼不上定義的類型，通常是公用成員，因此這個屬性的值並不重要，在大部分情況下，只要使用 現有相依性屬性的中繼資料。The callbacks in property metadata are not typically public members on the defining type, so the value of this property is not important for most scenarios that just consume an existing dependency property's metadata. 這個屬性會公開的其中一個原因是，讓中繼資料類別可以執行他們想要的合併的邏輯，基底中繼資料和覆寫或加入的中繼資料指定。One reason this property is exposed is so that metadata classes can perform their desired merge logic if both base metadata and overriding/adding metadata specify a . 預設合併邏輯是以維護所有實作中的資料表和呼叫每個項目，執行第一個階層中最深層的類別所建立的回呼。The default merge logic for is to maintain all implementations in a table and call each of them, with callbacks established by the deepest class in hierarchy running first. 是物件模型中定義為讀寫。 is defined in the object model as read-write. 這種情形初始化之後，您可以調整物件本身。This is so can be adjusted after initialization of the object itself. 不過，一旦一部分的呼叫會使用中繼資料， ，或、 對屬性系統將密封該中繼資料執行個體和內容現在會被視為不變。However, once the metadata is consumed as part of a call to , , or , the property system will seal that metadata instance and the properties are now considered immutable. 嘗試設定一旦是`true`此中繼資料執行個體將會引發例外狀況。Attempting to set once is `true` on this metadata instance will raise an exception.

exception.span: 一旦套用至相依性屬性作業，便無法設定中繼資料屬性。

span.span: Cannot set a metadata property once it is applied to a dependency property operation.
